instructions.advice: Follow the following preparatory steps to pair your connected devices within your network:
instructions.advice1: Prepare the device that you want to add within your network.
instructions.advice2: Please read the instructions for your device to know the manipulation to be carried out during the pairing procedure to add your object.
instructions.ready: Once ready, click on the {0} button to start the pairing procedure.

This object has {0} associated entities, each representing a possibility of interaction with

the equipment (action on the object, reading a value, etc.)
success.instructions: We advise you to rename them to help you!
